articles.description: Nate Sherwood scored 23 points, and Victor Sanders blocked a shot at the buzzer to give Idaho a 66-64 victory over Eastern Washington on Friday night.
articles.headline: Sanders blocks shot at buzzer; Idaho edges EWU 66-64

articles.description: Kendrick Nunn scored 21 of his 28 points in the second half to help Oakland beat Detroit Mercy 87-78 on Friday night.
articles.headline: Nunn scores 28, leads Oakland over Detroit Mercy 87-78

articles.description: Trey Moses scored 22 points, Tahjai Teague had 20 points and 14 rebounds and Ball State cruised to an 87-68 victory over Kent State on Friday night.
articles.headline: Moses, Teague lead Ball State over Kent State 87-68
